version.name: PMI: Smaller Hero Graphic with Search Box and Single Offer box without Tertiary Offers

messageModule.headline: Header max 30 chars, bold, 16px, can wrap to next line

mainModule.headline: Lorem ipsum dolar
mainModule.marketingXtras: Book your flight today with confidence with Expedia's Best Price Guarantee.

mainModule.headline: Lorem ipsum dolar
mainModule.marketingXtras: Book your flight today with confidence with Expedia's Best Price Guarantee.

offerModule.headline: What's your family's vacation style...
offerModule.para: Are they thrill-seekers or beach bums? Shop vacation by the theme and pick the perfect trip for your clan!

searchWizard.headline: Search and secure you low fare now.

version.specialRules:
Booking requirements: Fares above are based on required roundtrip booked for economy/coach travel.

Travel dates: Fares are valid for travel to and from Florida between August 17 and October 1, 2006. Fares are valid for travel between August 17 and October 27, 2006 to and from originations and destinations outside Florida.

Minimum/maximum stay: A one-night minimum stay is required for most fares.

+Additional taxes/fees: Prices shown are for one adult and are subject to additional charges, including, without limitation: the September 11th Security Fee of $2.50 for each flight segment originating at a U.S. airport, with a maximum of up to $5 per one-way or $10 per roundtrip; Passenger Facility Charges of up to $18, depending on itinerary; Federal Segment Fees of $3.30 per segment. A segment is defined as a takeoff and a landing.

Other conditions: Fares and rules are subject to change without notice. Seats are limited and may not be available on all flights/dates. Lower fares may be available to selected destinations. Tickets are nontransferable and nonrefundable.

Itinerary changes: The return portion on roundtrip fares may be changed for a $100 fee, provided the new itinerary is within the parameters of this offer, minimum and maximum stay requirements are met, and the origin and destination are not changed. If the reservation is cancelled before the ticketed departure date, the itinerary may be rebooked up to one year from the original ticket issuance date for a $100 service fee. If a reservation is not cancelled before the ticketed departure date, the ticket has no value.

If you do not wish to receive future e-mail advertisements from us, please click here. Please do not reply to this e-mail as we are not able to respond to messages sent to this e-mail address. If you've experienced any difficulty in being removed from an Expedia e-mail list, click here for personalized help.

To contact us or send feedback, please click here or contact us via postal mail at: Expedia, Inc., attn: PCC Team, 3150 139th avenue SE, Bellevue, WA 98005. For additional assistance, visit the Expedia.com Customer Support Center.

Prices are subject to availability and subject to change without notice.

All prices were current at the time this e-mail was published.

Hotel, vacation package, and cruise prices on the Expedia Website are constantly updated. Please refer to the site for the most current pricing. Vacation package prices shown are for one adult, economy class, based on double occupancy, and vary by dates, availability, and departure city. additional taxes, fees, and charges may apply. airfare is subject to, without limitation: (1) Sept. 11 Security Fee of $2.50 for each flight segment originating at a U.S. airport, up to $5 per one way or $10 per roundtrip; (2) up to $18 per roundtrip in local airport charges; (3) Federal Excise Tax of $3.20 per U.S. domestic flight segment; (4) a Travel Facilities Tax of up to $14.00 per roundtrip for domestic flights beginning or ending in alaska or Hawaii; and (5) for international and Puerto Rico/U.S. Virgin Islands destinations, government taxes and fees of up to $200 per roundtrip, depending on routing and destination (may vary slightly depending on currency exchange rates at time of booking). a segment is defined as a takeoff and a landing.
